Begin Mini-Page 20921
About the Foundation
This 501(c)(3) charitable foundation has been created
with the purpose of awarding deserving GCC employees and family members
educational scholarships to pursue advanced academic degrees and
certifications. Tenured employees and their immediate families will have the
opportunity to participate annually through a rigorous application process as
funds are available. Selected scholarship recipients may use these renewable
scholarship funds for eligible expenses associated with books, fees, and
tuition at accredited colleges, universities, or trade schools.
Inaugural members of the GCC Scholarship Foundation
Board of Directors include Frank Davis, Clarence Edwards, Eva-Marie Fox,
Col. Frank Foster, John Reynolds, Matt Smith, Pat Sullivan, Tom Stephenson,
Nate Einstein and Jeff Powell. As dedicated supporters and
members of Greenville Country Club, we present to you the opportunity to
encourage growth in our employees and support this endeavor by donating to the
Greenville Country Club Scholarship Foundation. Your support is critical to our
success!
End Mini-Page 20921

Begin Mini-Page 20554
Membership
Join Us at the Club
There has never been a more exciting time to join Greenville Country Club. Our state-of-the-art clubhouse, legendary golf courses, top-ranked tennis facilities and bustling social calendar makes Greenville Country Club one of the premier clubs of the South, and a part of your family and generations to come. Our club is invitation only.
End Mini-Page 20554
end one-column
Begin Mini-Page 20700
End Mini-Page 20700
Begin Mini-Page 20701
My parents joined the Greenville Country Club in the early ‘60s, and I have been a lifelong member of this special place. I was able to walk to the pool in the summers and sled on the practice range in the winters. Greenville Country Club has so much to offer—a brand new clubhouse, brand new pools, a top-ranked tennis facility, and two outstanding golf courses. My wife, Lisa, is on five tennis teams at last count, and I’ve played enough golf to be scratch (but somehow that’s not the case!). The food and service are fabulous, and we have the best management and staff in town with dedicated employees. We’ve met some of our closest friends through events at the Club, and there is nothing else like it in Greenville.
– Beattie Ashmore, Legacy Member
End Mini-Page 20701
Begin Mini-Page 20702
Greenville Country Club offers the following membership classifications:
Junior Resident Athletic
Resident Athletic
Social
End Mini-Page 20702
Begin Mini-Page 20703
End Mini-Page 20703
Begin Mini-Page 20704
Membership is by invitation only. For more information, please reach out to a Greenville Country Club Member you know and ask them to request a membership information packet for you to review.
End Mini-Page 20704

Contact
Contact the Club
Our friendly, welcoming staff is ready and willing to answer your questions from membership or career opportunities to how to book your next tee time or plan your upcoming social event.  We invite you to take a minute to complete the following form and a member of our team will reach out shortly to address your needs.

Begin Mini-Page 20544
About
A Greenville Tradition Since 1895
At the Greenville Country Club, history, tradition and thoughtful planning come together to create a member experience like no other. The club offers a variety of opportunities for its members, including two championship 18-hole golf courses—Chanticleer, designed by Robert Trent Jones, Sr., and Riverside, an original Thomas Bendelow design—as well as 17 lighted tennis courts, a wide array of dining experiences, social activities and a family-friendly aquatic center.
End Mini-Page 20544
end one-column
Begin Mini-Page 20577
End Mini-Page 20577
Begin Mini-Page 20578
Leadership
A Private Club Experience, Unmatched in the Southeast
Since its beginnings with the Piney Mountain Pioneers, Greenville Country Club’s Board of Governors and leadership remain central to advancing the vision of being an unmatched premier private club experience.
Learn About Its Leadership
End Mini-Page 20578
end card-panels
Begin Mini-Page 20845
End Mini-Page 20845
Begin Mini-Page 20846
"With a strong history and the vision to look forward with confidence, you will not find another club in the area that offers the opportunities available at Greenville Country Club."
- Patrick Sullivan, Greenville Country Club Member
End Mini-Page 20846

Careers

Join Our Team

Begin Mini-Page 20584
Leadership
An Unmatched Experience
Since its beginnings with the Piney Mountain Pioneers, Greenville Country Club has sought to create a family-centered private club experience unmatched in the Southeast. Some of Greenville’s most noteworthy leaders have helped shape what Greenville Country Club is today and continue to enhance it for generations to come.
End Mini-Page 20584

Begin Mini-Page 20870
Private Events
Hosting Private Events at GCC
From our exquisite presentation of food to the exceptional service and elegant atmosphere, Greenville Country Club is the perfect location for all your private event needs. Our commitment is to provide first-class planning, quality cuisine and service that will make your event unforgettable for you and your guests.
End Mini-Page 20870
end one-column
Begin Mini-Page 20871
End Mini-Page 20871
Begin Mini-Page 20872
Weddings, Special Events and Meetings
See all that we can do for you:
Graduation Parties
Rehearsal Dinners
Reunions
Afternoon Teas
School Banquets
Holiday Parties
Celebrations of Life
Anniversary and Birthday Parties
Bar/Bat Mitzvahs
Private Luncheons and Dinners
Retirement Celebrations
Baby and Bridal Showers
Business Meetings and Seminars
Family and Pre or Post-Wedding Brunches
End Mini-Page 20872
Begin Mini-Page 20873
End Mini-Page 20873
Begin Mini-Page 20874
Unique ~ Exceptional ~ Memorable
sophistication and Service
Each of the Club’s professionally designed and decorated rooms create an air of elegance, privacy and prestige. Our expert private event directors can arrange any event, from the most intimate of gatherings to a reception for hundreds. When hosting an event, whether for business, friends or family, you'll be proud to call Greenville Country Club your club. For more information about planning an event contact our Private Events Department at 864.516.2468.
Contact Us
End Mini-Page 20874
